reviews.review: portal 2
Крутая игра для тех кто любит входить в отверстия =)
Similar to the first game, but with a lot more story which is really fun.

This game does a great job of challenging your thinking and problem solving skillz. I highly recommend to all who love solving problems, sassy AIs, and a great story line to tie it all together. if you get this game, make sure you play the first one (Portal) so you can understand the story better, and download the free mod/DLC Portal Stories: Mel. it is a more challenging add on to the portal franchise that takes place between the first and second Portal games.

10/10 would recommend to all

It took me about 8 hours to complete and that's with some observation (although some puzzles I was stuck on lol) 
It's a beautiful game that still is amazing after all the years. The voice acting is so good it feels like you're talking with the bots (but you can't talk). As far as anything negative about the game I really don't have anything to say. It's non-repetitive, it sounds amazing, it looks amazing, it's funny, and there are always some little easter eggs you can find in some of the chambers

Tout simplement un des meilleurs jeux auxquels j'ai joué, la narration est prenante et le gameplay à la fois dynamique mais nécessitant de la reflexion. La difficulté est bien dosée je trouve.
Il faut juste l'essayer pour se rendre compte du chef d'oeuvre que c'est. Bonus avec le mode coopératif très sympa lui aussi où on poursuit l'histoire solo dans le complexe d'Aperture Science...

Simple game and takes some time, the graphics are good but I would like it to be better Overall Good game Recommended Buy with you guys I like the idea of the game (:

- PopDesigner

I played for over 100 hours on my other account a few years ago, decided to play again and it's just as good as when I first played it.

Lots of puzzles, story, and unique characters...

It also has a lot of lore to it too that you can dig into or leave at base level.

It's a fun game, basically one of my favorites of all time, I played it for a year straight, and I've played a lot of games.

I don't know how much else to say this without spoiling anything, but it's a very fun game with some mind-bending elements, lots of lore too, and an all around enjoyable and fun game, lots of twists to the story and breaking borders of the game that usually wouldn't be possible. Very Cool, thanks Valve
